column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I went there on a date and we ordered 5 different tapas. We ordered the deviled eggs (which are in the bite size tapas section) and they were delicious! There were 3 of them so we each had one and a half. They suggest that you choose one from each of the 4 types of tapas on their menu (Vegetables/Cheese
column4: and Beef & Lamb). We decided to take their advice and got the Goat Cheese Baked in Tomato Sauce
